briefTitle: An Open-label Extension Study of Certolizumab Pegol in Chinese Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Enrolled in RA0044
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-label Extension Study To Assess The Safety And Efficacy Of Certolizumab Pegol As Additional Medication To Methotrexate In Chinese Subjects With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Participated In RA0044.
summary: This study will continue to evaluate the safety \& efficacy of Certolizumab Pegol (CZP) for 6 months in Chinese subjects with active Rheumatoid Arthritis who participated in RA0044.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects That Withdrew Due to a Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to the end of observation period (32 weeks)
